events.message: The customer submitted a claim reporting a car accident that occurred on March 30th involving a collision with another vehicle.
The claim was categorised as an Auto Accident claim based on the details provided about the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to guide the customer through the claim process and gather more information.
The customer received confirmation from the insurance company acknowledging receipt of the Auto Accident claim.
The agent requested the customer to submit the accident report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates.
The customer uploaded all requested documents including the police accident report, vehicle photos, and repair bills.
The insurance team initiated an investigation to verify accident details and liability as per the submitted documents.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the other driver was at fault in the collision.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the vehicle repair costs and related medical expenses arising from the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and the communication throughout the claim process.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance company, authorizing the payment to the customer.
The settlement payment was issued to the customer’s bank account to cover all approved repair and medical costs.
The claim was closed after successful payment and confirmation that the customer’s vehicle repairs were completed.
